General.Name: WAPS Co. Ltd
General.Description: WAPS Co., Ltd manufactures and sells various value-added new polymer materials, such as automobile interior materials, construction, and leisure materials. The company also offers construction exterior materials for buildings used for landscape/architecture exterior, such as deck, fence, and siding. Its products are used to produce various products, such as electric, electronic, automobile parts, wire/communication cable coating, and semiconductor parts packaging materials. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.
